item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Z Bar on Wickenden Street on the East Side

Z Bar has been around forever and is truly a Rhode Island restaurant institution. Located on the corner of Wickenden and Brook Streets, it offers a casual atmosphere and dining outside in the summer. It has something for everyone. Most exciting is that just for us they are offering free appetizers and two for one drink specials!!!! We haven't been back since 2009 (unbelievable), so its high time we go, and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

Bring a friend!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm still deciding on which scarf - maybe I'll break out the blue fuzzy one for old time's sake - keep posted!
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Z Bar
